description: Codebase is the Schema for the Codebases API.

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: CodebaseSpec defines the desired state of Codebase.

branchToCopyInDefaultBranch.description:
While we clone new codebase we can select specific branch to clone.
Selected branch will become a default branch for a new codebase (e.g. master, main).

buildTool.description: A build tool which is used on codebase.

ciTool.description: A name of tool which should be used as CI.

disablePutDeployTemplates.description: Controller must skip step "put deploy templates" in action chain.

emptyProject.description: A flag indicating how project should be provisioned. Default: false

gitServer.description:
A name of git server which will be used as VCS.
Example: "gerrit".

gitUrlPath.description: A relative path for git repository. Should start from /. Example: /company/api-app.

private.description: Private indicates if we need to create private repository.

strategy.description: integration strategy for a codebase, e.g. clone, import, etc.

type.description: Type of codebase. E.g. application, autotest or library.

startFrom.description: StartFrom is required when versioning type is not default.

status.description: CodebaseStatus defines the observed state of Codebase.

available.description: This flag indicates neither Codebase are initialized and ready to work. Defaults to false.

detailedMessage.description:
Detailed information regarding action result
which were performed

failureCount.description: Amount of times, operator fail to serve with existing CR.

git.description: Specifies a status of action for git.

lastTimeUpdated.description: Information when the last time the action were performed.

status.description: Specifies a current status of Codebase.

username.description: Name of user who made a last change.

value.description: Specifies a current state of Codebase.

webHookID.description:
Stores ID of webhook which was created for a codebase.
Deprecated: Because the webhook id can be more than just an integer. Use WebHookRef instead.

webHookRef.description: WebHookRef stores unique reference to webhook which was created for a codebase.
